todos.content: Update ME/CFS severity classification system based on NICE guideline (mild, moderate, severe, very severe)
Enhance Quick Screen tool with NICE-compliant suspicion criteria (4 core symptoms)
Update Red Flag Checker with NICE differential diagnosis investigations
Revise PEM Quest tool to align with NICE post-exertional malaise definition
Update Criteria Engine with NICE diagnostic criteria and 3-month timeline
Create Energy Management tool based on NICE energy management principles
Add NICE-compliant sleep and rest management guidance
Update Subtype Advisor with NICE symptom management recommendations
Add orthostatic intolerance assessment and guidance
Create care planning and multidisciplinary team guidance section
Add specific guidance for children and young people throughout app
Include NICE flare-up and relapse management protocols
